title: Women's Rights National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Visitor Center : Open every day of the week from 9:00 am - 5:00 pm (except Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's Day) Location 136 Fall Street Seneca Falls, NY 13148 315.568.0024  Wesleyan Chapel: Open every day of the week from 9:00 am - 4:30 pm. Tours are offered daily throughout the year. Guided tours leave from inside the Visitor Center and begin at 10:30 am and 1:30 pm.Other park buildings: Open only during guided tours.Stanton House tours are only offered during the spring, summer, and fall seasons. Guided tours are offered daily at 11:30 am and 2:30 pm M'Clintock House is open Saturday and Sunday 1:00 pm - 4:00 pm from Memorial Day to Labor Day.       The M'Clintock House, site of the drafting of the Declaration of Sentiments for the Women's Rights Convention. Open Saturday and Sunday during the summer. NPS
